attributes.content: 08:30 A.M. - Snowstorm
Northlands - Infy Ice Field - Rhine Lab Temporary Research Outpost #420
System unlocked.
attributes.name: Device

attributes.content: Year: Unknown
attributes.name: Device

attributes.content: Time and date error. Switching to manual control.
attributes.name: Device

attributes.content: Authenticate identity to proceed.
attributes.name: Device

attributes.content: Hm, let's see here... Right. Rhine Lab Field Specialist, Magallan.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Authenticating——
attributes.name: Device

attributes.content: Authentication complete. Voice print confirmed.
attributes.name: Device

attributes.content: Beep——
attributes.name: Device

attributes.content: Fingerprint confirmed.
attributes.name: Device

attributes.content: (lively feminine voice) Hi! How are you, Maggie? Welcome back!
attributes.name: Device

attributes.content: Well that's weird.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I guess I shouldn't have let Mayer play with the sign-in system. What a weird function...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Welp, anyway, let's get to work!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: This is our last survey of the year. Let's make sure there's nothing new.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: By now, all regions marked for survey are done. Once they finish their other tasks, they'll start on the trip back.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Phew. Done.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I am really no good at writing reports. Let's hear the audio.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (lively feminine voice) Hi , Maggie! Today is the one hundred, eighty, seventh day of your survey.
attributes.name: Device

attributes.content: Wow, I've been out here a while. The time really flies.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: (lively feminine voice) You have been out so long, shouldn't you head back? Everyone misses you.
attributes.name: Device

attributes.content: Huh?! Was that in there before... Don't tell me Mayer snuck in some new parameters.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Well, it's a cute little surprise either way. How nice.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But, as for going back, I think...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: This snowstorm looks like it'll last at least a week. Good thing I've got plenty of supplies.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Let's take another look at the to do list. I think I remember a few things still need doing.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Let's see here. Right. Sample collection is done. Searching for clues in the ruins, I think we can call that done.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Nothing much new, compared to last year. If only we had a discovery like the year before.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It's pretty normal, but I bet the section chief still chews me out for getting greedy.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Nothing here either... Oh? Here's a blank. Low temperature test of new materials... oh.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I totally forgot!! Where did I put that new material?!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Oh crap! They're gonna kill me if I lose it!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Phew. That was close. I just left it in my outer pocket.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The outer pocket is 43 degrees below zero. I kept it there six hours. It retains elasticity.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Now to test hardness.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Hey!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Well, no problem. Into the experiment chamber you go.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Thank goodness I put it in my jacket...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: With the blizzard and all, I guess I can just put it outside the door and see how it holds up in a low temperature environment.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I think the current temperature out there should be right.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Okay, Magallan. Here we go. Take a deep breath, open the door a split second, toss the thing out, then shut it.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Gotta be quick, precise, decisive. Or else the snowstorm gets in here and we're all done.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Excuse me...
Aaaaaaaaaaaaaah!!!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Magallan, did you just see a ghost?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Yes, Magallan, and she was very pretty. Still a ghost though.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But how could there be another person up here in the Northlands?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: C- could it be some kind of snow ghost?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: No way. I just have to open the door and take another look. I have to answer this question with science!!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: There's no such thing as ghosts! And I'm not so cold that I'm hallucinating!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: What if it's some kind of uncontacted tribe? That would be huge! Go for it, Magallan!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Excuse me, can I come in?
Er... Um... You... I...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Don't be afraid. I am not a ghost. Here, touch my face.
Huh? What?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Oh, okay...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Wow. You're warm! But how? How are you here in the Northlands?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: ...are you a Sami?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Ah...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I don't know why that seems disappointing to you, but I am indeed a Sami. Nice to meet you, little girl.
H- hi. I still don't know how you got here, but please come in. A normal person would freeze to death out there.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I mean, wouldn't a blizzard like this be a problem even for a Sami?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Thank you.
Here, have some tea.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Thank you.
What's your name?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: You may call me——
Let's say Simone. Simone. And your name, little girl?
My codename is Magallan! Rhine Lab Field Specialist, assigned to Research Outpost #420...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It's only me here, at the moment.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I see.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Simone, why are you here? Did you get caught in the storm...?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I was entrusted with the search for a certain individual.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Search? In the Northlands? There's no one here. For all the months I've been, I've seen maybe a couple living organisms.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The client informed me that she would be active in this area.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Why are you looking for her?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: This storm will last for some time, which should delay her movements. I came here to retrieve her.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Oh, really? Do you mean me?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I am not certain.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: R- right. So you're not here for me. But the weather as it is, it really doesn't bother you?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The Sami... rather, I am familiar with snow.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: But if the weather continues to deteriorate, many things will change in unpredictable ways.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Yeah. I knew this storm would last a while, but I didn't think it would be this intense.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I wanted to wait for the wind to die down a bit... We would have to speed things up like this.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: According to the calendar and my observations, tomorrow would be the best time!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: And we have enough supplies. I really did well.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: All these supplies are for you alone?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Oh, no. These are for all the people living at this research station to hold out until next year's survey season.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: If you need to live here for a while, you can use these supplies too.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But you can't touch my equipment!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Oh. Okay.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Good, well, now that that's decided, let's get packing!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Sorry, Simone, there's a few things I have to prepare.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Sure. No problem. I won't get in the way.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Suitcase, suitcase, where did I put my suitcase? Oh, I remember. I brought it down from the loft and put it in the kitchen!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The survey apparatus, and the drone... Meh, it's fine.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Just need to charge a bit.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Is there anything I can help you with?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Huh? Oh, no. I can take care of all of this myself.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I've been doing this all by myself for a while. I got lots of practice.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: So this is where you work?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: That's right. I do research and observation.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: What do you observe?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: All the ice fields of the Northlands!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: And you're the only one here?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Yep. That's my job.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: You don't get lonely?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: I do! But I don't think loneliness and happiness are mutually exclusive.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I know my colleagues are all waiting for me to come back. And I know these ice fields hold so many amazing secrets waiting to be unlocked. So it's not that bad.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Sometimes I get lonely. But most of the time, I'm really very happy!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: To be alone... is very scary. A life like this... I don't even know what to say.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: I know it's not for everyone.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Being an explorer isn't easy!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Err, ahem, being a scientist!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: You are... truly optimistic.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Hehe. To borrow the words of one of the greats: 'An explorer's best friend is loneliness!'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Oh, but the section chief said I have this bad habit of talking to myself. Do I? I don't think I do?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It's fine, Miss Magallan. You are a fine person.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Oh. Huh. Heh. Really?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Yes.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Okay, the station's energy reserves should hold up all right, as long as I set the hibernation times right. So...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Right. Like I said, aside from the research equipment, you're free to use anything you want, Simone.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I see. Thank you.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: But I am Infected. Is it okay for us to share supplies? To share this facility?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: You noticed, didn't you, Magallan?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Er, yes. I noticed. You certainly didn't do anything to hide it.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: You are not afraid?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: It surprised me a bit at first glance... it did! You don't usually see crystal distributions like this...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But really, as pretty as you are, Simone, those crystals look even more special.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: You need not avoid my eyes.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Oh, your eyes... huh? You should really get treatment, Simone. It's a little dangerous there.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That is not what I mean. My meaning is, do you not fear infection?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Oh. No, I don't need to worry about that. Rhine Lab's research has proven time and again that Oripathy transmission from person to person is not nearly as easy as most people think.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Even though nobody seems to listen... Sigh.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I have lots of Infected friends and colleagues. It's no big deal.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: ...Really?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Yep. Really. Everyone at Rhine Lab Medical is really proud of what we've accomplished!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But when it comes to Infected stuff, we can't compare to a pharmaceutical company called 'Rhodes Island...'
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It pisses off some of my colleagues, but it's the truth. They do really amazing work on Oripathy over there.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That's why Rhine Lab signed a cooperation agreement with Rhodes Island. I'm actually going there myself!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I'm pretty excited. I have no idea what it's like, but I really hope I can get some really good research done! I thought I'd be cooped up in a lab forever...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: You really like to talk, don't you?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Obviously! I really like talking to other people. But, um, if I start to talk your ear off, you can just tell me. I'll quiet down...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Not at all. I like you talking about all these things I don't know.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Oh. Huh. I'm blushing a little...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: You know, Simone, you could go to Rhodes Island for treatment! Hey, I could even take you there!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: You aren't worried that I have some ulterior motive?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Ulterior motive?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That I am bad.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Okay, Simone, are you bad then?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: ...Yes. Am I bad then.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Magallan, do you feel like the temperature is dropping?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: The temperature? Huh, now that you mention it, it is a bit colder than it was before... Hold on... Oh no...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Warning, anomaly detected in climate control center, outer heating function will be disabled.
Warning...
That's not good. Excuse me a second, I need to check on that control system.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Uh oh. Exterior heating pipes sprung a leak. Probably just worn out...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Sorry, Simone, I have to step outside for a bit.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: What is going to happen?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: If I let the system go ahead and shut down the outer heat shell, the outpost isn't going to make it to next season. Or at least, it won't be able to support life.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: How many days do we have?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Two months, give or take... No matter how familiar you are with snow, you wouldn't be able to live here.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I won't. I am leaving the Northlands soon.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Is that right.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: ...are you still packing?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: I'm getting ready to go out there.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Did you not just say it could last two months?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Yeah, that's no good! It's gotta make it to next season!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: It is not safe to be out there in that storm. Such a harsh environment may endanger your life. Don't go.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: No can do. This outpost isn't just for me. It's a base of operations, and it needs to hold up for good.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: No one else is coming in this weather.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Simone, you just showed up in this weather like ten minutes ago.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I am different. I am not an explorer, Magallan.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Phew... this heater is heavy...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: This outpost is even more important.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: For an explorer, base camps like this outpost are lifesaving nodes. If this outpost goes down, an explorer who runs out of supplies or gets lost might come here and find only death.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Okay, but, since the time it was built, up until I got here, has anyone else come by?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Not a one.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Then what does it matter?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: It matters.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: How are you so sure?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Because there will be someone coming by. Maybe not tomorrow, maybe not until the next research season, maybe not for another couple of years.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: You are just making baseless assumptions. Magallan, it is dangerous out there.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: No one is coming. At least not until the dry season. No explorer is coming.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Simone... You said you're not an explorer, didn't you?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That is correct.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Well, different explorers make different choices.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Some of them might choose to come here when it's nice and calm, to explore the length and breadth of the Northlands. No one's done it yet, but people are always trying.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: And some of them might come here at its most dangerous, to see how the land shapes and changes, to record what they see and bring it back to civilization.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The Black Flow of Bolivar, the highland plains of Kazimierz, the undersea volcanoes of Iberia... there was a time when no one had seen them either.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But now the explorers have been and gone, planted their flags.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: And there are still many places in the world no one has set foot on yet. But that's all it means. Not yet.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Today, I set foot on this ice field. That means more people will come in the future.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: And we have no idea under what circumstances they'll be coming.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: And if no one else comes in your lifetime?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: After you go back, won't this station fall into ruin?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: I can't give up. There's always that minute chance that some nonexistant explorer might come along two months later.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Simone... You have to understand. I, Magallan, believe in exploration. I believe in explorers.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: One day, our footprints will cover this entire land.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: ...You have put your hopes in a future that may not come to pass. Will you not be disappointed?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: No big deal. An explorer spends her whole life discovering, and her whole life being disappointed.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: No explorer's discovery is purely her own. Every one of us stands on the shoulders of all the explorers who came before us. Every discovery is connected to a long and storied past.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Like, I'm only here in this ice field because of a story I heard as a child.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: But I know in my heart that even if the thing I'm looking for doesn't exist, everything I do still has meaning.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Even if it's just some empty, disappointing, imaginary meaning.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Oof, this heater is a little too powerful... burned my hair last time. Oh well, on you go!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: ...I see.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Yep! Welp, here I go!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Let me go in your stead.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Simone, you came here looking for someone, right? Our outpost here doesn't hire anybody!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: I already found her.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Huh.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: You mean me, Magallan?
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: The environment has deteriorated to the point where our messenger was unable to inform you in advance.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Allow me to reintroduce myself. I am a Rhodes Island Operator, codename 'Santalla.' I am here to retrieve you. Of course, you can keep calling me Simone.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Let me go in your stead.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Wow...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Nope. It's too risky!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: That's what I should be saying to you.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Nope nope nope. I'm the field specialist here. It's my responsibility.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Don't underestimate me.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Huh.
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Tell me how to do the repair, Operator Magallan. And let me take care of everything outside.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Okay, okay, I got it. Here, take this!
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: What is it?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Just press this button and I'll come out and get you! And take this, and this...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: Heh heh, thank you...
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: I truly found the right person. I don't need them, Magallan.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: You do! I can't let you go out there without...
attributes.name: Magallan

attributes.content: No. Operator Magallan... trust me.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: The land, she trusts me too.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: We spend our whole lives discovering, and our whole lives being disappointed. Right?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Foolish Sami. What will this resistance accomplish?
You are indeed impressive. We cannot escape this storm.
But what does it matter? Ursus will crush you, swallow your cities, devour your land!
Witch... we will not kill you.
We will die, but you will live. You must live. You must see the land stained with blood!
Take this. A gift from the dead! Take it, with your eye!
Scream! Cry! Then live!
We die in glory! You live in ignominy! Forever!!
Witch!
Indeed. How was it I always felt this world would die?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: So long as there are children like this, the world will find a way to flourish.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Rest assured, Magallan. There are some things that are beyond you. Let the adults handle it. It is good for us too.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: '...Listen ♪...'
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: '...Flourishing life blooming white, buried black seeds deep in the night... ♪'
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: 'Sing out, pretty girl. Cry out, pretty girl ♪'
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: 'The snow hears your song, the blizzard keeps you warm ♪'
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: ——Snows of the Northlands, do you hear my song?
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: Magallan... I want you to follow your dreams.
attributes.name: Simone

attributes.content: There. That should stop the snow.
attributes.name: Simone
